title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders and stand out as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, the text fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out even more.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page on motif platforms should not have automatic borders and should not have different colored backgrounds on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the text fields on motif platforms for automatic borders.
4. Also observe the text fields on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms for different colored backgrounds.
